name: GrammarTeacher
0:
”Alexa, ask grammar teacher for help.”
”Alexa, ask grammar teacher to check there is three people standing there.”
”Alexa, ask grammar teacher to check he was laugh.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: grammar teacher
des:
Ever thought of having an assistant who helps you with your grammar? Grammar Teacher is here to the rescue!

Grammar Teacher is a Skill that tries to find any mistakes you make in your sentences and provides replacements for them.

To check if the skill is enabled, just say, "grammar teacher".

Say, "ask grammar teacher to check {a sentence you want checked}"

Example, "Alexa, ask grammar teacher to check there is three people there".
Alexa should reply, "is ... doesn't seem correct. I suggest using ... are".

To access help from within the skill, say, "Alexa, ask grammar teacher for help".

Contact the developer, James Jacob Kurian, at jamesjacobart@gmail.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
